page.title: 07HOUSING
page.content: BOZEAT HAS EXPANDED SINCE THE 1960'S,THREE HOUSING ESTATES HAVE BEEN BUILT.THE TYPE OF HOUSING CONSISTS OF MOSTLY SEMI-DETACHED,BUNGALOWS AND SOME DETACHED, SOME OF THESE HAVE BEEN EXTENDED TO PROVIDE EXTRA ACCOMMODATION.THEY ARE ALL OF BRICK CONSTRUCTION WITH TILED ROOFS. OUT OF 725 HOUSES THERE ARE 14 THAT ARE LISTED.THE CHURCH IS OF NORMAN ORIGIN AND LISTED AS GRADE A.THERE WAS A GREAT FIRE IN 1729 WHICH DESTROYED HOUSES BUILT PRIOR TO THAT DATE. THE OLDEST HOUSE IN THE VILLAGE WHERE THE FENN FAMILY LIVE,29 MILE STREET.JUST RECENTLY HAS UNDERGONE EXTENSIVE RENOVATION . IT IS GRADE 2 LISTED.THE LISTED BUILDINGS ARE CONSTRUCTED OF LOCAL LIMESTONE,ONLY 5 HAVE THATCHED ROOFS.TO CONCLUDE,1 BUILDING IS GRADE A,8 ARE GRADE 2,AND 5 ARE ON THE LOCAL LIST.
